item.title: Help? i maked full world safe zone but know i cant make any pk zone!:O
item.dc:creator: @bloempot99 bloempot99
item.description:
@bloempot99 wrote:

help?

i maked the full world safe zone but know i cant make any pk zone!

i placed this code but maybe i need to do something with treu or false?

public boolean inwildy = false; public boolean inwildy2 = false; public void checkwildy() { if((absX >= 3090 && absX <= 3134 && absY >= 3904 && absY <= 3957)) { inwildy = true; } else { inwildy = false; } } public void checkwildy2() { if((absX >= 3090 && absX <= 3134 && absY >= 3904 && absY <= 3957)) { inwildy2 = true; } else { inwildy2 = false; } }

the coords are alreading stand there, but cant make it pk, i dont know why, but i have been to that place and still says, u cannot attack anyone, ur in safe zone. any help with how to make it safe zone?

phonescape based

Read full topic
